title: Terminal Scrollback Support in Agent GUI

comment: PRE-REVIEW COMPLIANT. Verified: frontmatter title='Terminal Scrollback Support in Agent GUI', revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1). All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present with substantive content. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) outside execution-phase sections. No typos or formatting errors found. Section numbering sequential and correct. References include SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004. Scope is well-bounded to 2 GUI files. No additional Technical Units required -- change does not affect Flow State core systems.

POST-REVIEW: NON-COMPLIANT — 1 deficiency. Frontmatter revision_summary='Initial draft' is stale for v1.1. Per SOP-001 Section 5.1, revision_summary must be 'Updated each revision cycle to describe changes.' The document was revised from v1.0 to v1.1 with execution results (EI table, execution comments, execution summary). The revision_summary must be updated to describe these changes (e.g., 'Add execution results and evidence'). All other post-review criteria met: all 3 EIs Pass, no VARs, no controlled documents modified, execution summary substantive, commit evidence verified (stripTerminalModes() confirmed in useHubConnection.ts). No placeholder content, no typos, formatting consistent.

POST-REVIEW COMPLIANT (Round 2). Previous deficiency resolved: revision_summary updated from 'Initial draft' to 'Add execution results and evidence' — accurately describes v1.1 changes. All post-review criteria verified: frontmatter title='Terminal Scrollback Support in Agent GUI', all 3 EIs Pass (no VARs), no controlled documents affected, execution summary substantive with commit evidence (stripTerminalModes() in useHubConnection.ts), no placeholder content, no typos, formatting consistent. Pre-approved content (Sections 1-9) unchanged from pre-review. Recommend for post-approval.
